name: Siiimple
author: Siiimple

sections.description: L’extension Siiimple fournit une solution clé-en-main dédiée, simplifie l’interface d’administration WordPress et permet d’accéder facilement aux ressources de l’agence de marketing Siiimple.
sections.changelog:
3.1.1

Release Date: June 24th, 2024
* Fixed: Micromodal.js library integration with WordPress Multisite
* Increased: Dashboard CSS
* Increased: Floating Call to Action buttons with modal
* Increased: WordPress Menus with modal

3.1.0

Release Date: May 28th, 2024
* Micromodal.js library integration

3.0.12

Release Date: March 19th, 2024
* Sirdata conditional shortcodes
* WordPress 6.5 compatibility

3.0.11

Release Date: January 11th, 2024
* Sirdata CMP Google Partner Program

3.0.10

Release Date: April 13th, 2023
* Customer service contact information

3.0.9

Release Date: April 12th, 2023
* Fixed: plugin version

3.0.8

Release Date: April 12th, 2023
* Branding – GA4 events tracking – RSS Feeds deactivation option – Update of administrators
* Fixed: Floating Call to Action buttons target

3.0.7

Release Date: September 16th, 2021
* Increased: Floating Call to Action buttons

3.0.6

Release Date: September 15th, 2021
* Fixed: Floating Call to Action buttons

3.0.5

Release Date: September 15th, 2021
* Floating Call to Action buttons

3.0.4

Release Date: May 20th, 2021
* Fixed: Google Analytics HubSpot events tracking

3.0.3

Release Date: May 18th, 2021
* Google Analytics HubSpot events tracking

3.0.2

Release Date: April 28th, 2021
* Google Analytics third party option – Notiiion link integration

3.0.1

Release Date: April 12th, 2021
* RGPD compliance via Sirdata CMP – Hubspot plugin integration

3.0.0

Release Date: April 10th, 2021
* RGPD compliance – Sirdata CMP integration

* Fixed: Google Analytics cross-domain measurement

* Google Analytics cross-domain measurement
